title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 616.5 - Other conditions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 616.5 - Other conditions

State Regulations

All or any portion of claims for reimbursement for
assistance to refugees, entrants or other noncitizens of New York shall, except
when submitted in accordance with the direction of the department, be subject
to disapproval by the department unless the department specifically approves
the particular expenditures or costs so claimed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
616.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
